name: Guardians of the Galaga
description:
This is a game I made for Trijam 166.

Controls:

Move with left and right arrow keys or a and d

Upgrade weapon with up arrow or w

Shoot with space bar

https://github.com/SmallConfusion/Guardians-of-the-Galaga

If you have performance issues, please download a native version for your OS. It will run better.
